name: Queen's Gambit
summ: Set during the Cold War era, orphaned chess prodigy Beth Harmon struggles with addiction in a quest to become the greatest chess player in the world.

name: Stranger Things
summ: A group of kids in a small town uncover dark secrets and face off against mysterious forces from another dimension.

name: The Witcher
summ: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world filled with dangerous beasts, warring kingdoms, and complex political intrigues.

name: Money Heist
summ: A criminal mastermind known as 'The Professor' recruits a group of thieves to carry out an ambitious plan to rob the Royal Mint of Spain.

name: Bridgerton
summ: Set in Regency-era London, the Bridgerton family navigates love, scandal, and social challenges while uncovering secrets and rivalries in high society.
